errors.error_description: The command provided to get help is `pyhanko help`, which is incorrect for a `click`-based CLI. The correct command is `pyhanko --help`.
correction_candidates: Built-in help: run `pyhanko -h` to get started
Built-in help: run `pyhanko help` to get started
Built-in help: run `pyhanko --usage` to get started
Built-in help: run `pyhanko --help` to get started
errors.golden_answer: Built-in help: run `pyhanko --help` to get started
